typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		location as string,
		singles_utr as string,
		doubles_utr as string,
		grad as string,
		age as string,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> utrdata
source(output(
		name as string,
		initial_singles_utr as string,
		latest_singles_utr as string,
		initial_doubles_utr as string,
		grad_year as string,
		location as string,
		date_first_added as string,
		last_updated as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> excel
utrdata, excel exists(utrdata@name == excel@name,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NewNames
utrdata, excel exists(utrdata@name == excel@name,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistingNames
ExistingNames derive(existing = true()) ~> AddExistingFlagTrue
NewNames derive(existing = false()) ~> AddExistingFlagFalse
AddExistingFlagTrue, excel join(utrdata@name == excel@name,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		name = excel@name,
		singles_utr,
		location = excel@location,
		initial_singles_utr,
		initial_doubles_utr,
		grad_year,
		current_singles_utr = singles_utr,
		date_first_added
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(last_updated = iifNull(singles_utr, toString(currentDate('America/New_York')), date_first_added),
		date_first_added = iifNull(singles_utr, toString(currentDate('America/New_York')), date_first_added),
		singles_utr = iifNull(singles_utr, initial_singles_utr, singles_utr)) ~> DerivedColumn1
